page.title: 17Clubs For Children,Sellindge
page.content: Within the village there are various organisations which exist for children. A Brownie Pack,run by Mrs.Wyatt and Mrs.James meets every Thursday during school terms in the School Hall from 3.15p.m.when school ends until 5.00p.m This is for girls aged from 7 to 11 years of age and there are 20 members. A Girl Guide troop meets each Friday in the Derling Hall from 6 to 7.30p.m. This is run by Mrs.Martinez and at present there are about 20 members aged 11 or over. For boys,Cubs and Scouts meet in the School Hall on Fridays,Cubs from 5 to 7p.m.and Scouts from 7 to 9p.m.Cubs are organised by Mrs.Broome and Mr. Jaques,Scouts by Mr.Prince with Mr. Kirk as overall Scouter for both. A Youth Club meets in the Village Hall on Thursdays from 7 to 9p.m.
